trends: There have been no other sightings in Carp
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsme and a friend were walkin down our desearted blacked out small town streets...we were having a smoke just enjoying the nice peace and quiet...coming up to an intersection a bright object popped out of the clouds to our right ..this thing was bright...we froze and just starred at the luminous obect just sitting there...i whispered this is number 2 in two months. then just as it popped out it popped back into the clouds...to our left was a helicopter heading in the objects direction right after it moved behind the clouds... for the rest of the night we were a little shaken but mostly excited about our siting. for the rest of the night we watched the skies for any more activity.i am a firm believer in unknown intelligent craft not of this world...who knows what is out there...or more like on our doorstep.
Summary: bright ufo pops out of the clouds ...lights up the blacked out streets
